QuestData.Title: Fight and Flight
QuestData.Description:
Mograine and Emeni will lead the assault on the western gate.
You and Xandria will advance from the east. Secure the area and slay all who oppose you.
Once we have them surrounded, we can strike the final blow against Gharmal.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly with Xandria to the House of Constructs.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Xandria by the Hall of Chains.
QuestData.RewardText: This place is mired with atrocities. They must be purged.
